name: Lone StarFighter
description:
This game was built using the listed assets:

Enemy ship sprites done by clayster2012 licensed under OGA-BY 3.0
Player ship sprites done by clayster2012 licensed under CC-BY 3.0
Backgrounds are by Rawdanitsu licensed under CC0
Boss Ship is "Yellow Starship" by MillionthVector licensed under CC BY 4.0
Explosions are "Explosion Set 1 (M484 Games)" by [Master484 licensed under CC0

Font is "Press Start" by codeman38 website licensed under a derivative of the original Bitstream Vera copyright

Sound effects from "8-bit sound FX" by Dizzy Crow licensed under a CC0
Game music is Made by me at my github you will find thew code that made them

This game was programmed in Godot.
